Method Detail

bind

Binding bind(NamingContext ctx,
             Binding binding)
Called by NamingContext.addBinding(Name, Object) when adding a binding.

Parameters:
ctx - The context to add to.
binding - The binding to add.
Returns:
The binding to bind, or null if the binding should be ignored.

unbind

void unbind(NamingContext ctx,
            Binding binding)
Parameters:
ctx - The context to unbind from
binding - The binding that was unbound.
